author: Alexander Smith
title: Coronavirus: NBC's Janis Mackey Frayer reunited with family after 49 days
description: NBC News correspondent Janis Mackey Frayer shared the moment she was reunited with her son after seven weeks covering the coronavirus and subsequent quarantine.
content:
NBC News correspondent Janis Mackey Frayer has shared the moment she was reunited with her son, 6, after seven weeks covering the coronavirus pandemic and her subsequent time in quarantine.
Frayer, who is based in Beijing, traveled to the Chinese city of Wuh… [+390 chars]
